subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alessandro Petacchi won a mass sprint to take the second stage of the Giro d’Italia, with Mark Cavendish finishing second to take the overall lead by 12 seconds.
snippet: Alessandro Petacchi won a mass sprint to take the second stage of the Giro d’Italia, with Mark Cavendish finishing second to take the overall lead by 12 seconds.
